Q_DESC:
Create a class called student with the following private data members / member variables, name of type string, marks[5] of type int and attendancePercentage of type int.
Include the following public member functions . methods
initialize-data() that accepts 3 arguments and its return type is void. This function is used to set the values for name,marks and attendancePercentage. The arguments are passed to this function in the same order.
getName() that accepts no arguments and returns a string.
getattendancePercentage() that accepts no arguments and returns a int.
CalculateAverage() that accepts no arguments and returns a float.
In the main function, create an object of class student. Invoke all the above methods and test them.

Input :- 1st line contains name.
             2nd line space seperated marks value;
             3rd line attendence.
Output:- 1 st line attendence
              2nd  line average.
